author: Jeff Kelly
comment: It's not perfectly in the middle of my moto 360. The bar on the outside is thicker on the right and thinner on the left. Just had someone else look and its not just me. Tried restarting, same. I'm still keeping it because I love it.
title: One issue away from being perfect

author: Brandon Bryant
comment: Everything is great except for when I charge my moto 360. It charges verrryyyy slow. It only does it when I have this watch face running. I suspect the issue is that the watch face animation is running for some reason when I dock the watch. If you guys could fix this it would be fantastic.
title: Something you guys need to fix

author: Kalen Rixon
comment: The ambient mode on my 360 v2 is nothing like the preview. It looks all splotchy and distorted. Tried uninstalling/reinstalling and rebooting.
title: Ambient mode not working on Moto 360 v2

author: Matthew Jackson
comment: Only been using for a few minutes, however I can already see that ambient mode has issues. It almost looks like it flickers. This only happens on this watch face and it isn't the same flickering that the anti-burn in thing does. Using Huawei Watch.
title: Looks great, but not perfect.

author: Meks O
comment: Love the watch face, the only problem is when it is on ambient mode, time text is hard to read even by just glancing at the watch. It would be great if there's a variety of options for the ambient mode
title: Ambient mode: could be better

author: Owen Ruggiero
comment: As others have said, this drains the battery quickly. I think making the background (where the stars are) simply black in ambient mode would fix this issue.
title: Battery problems

author: Preston Rice
comment: Really clean app, looks like its a paid app, never crashes, and mostly I don't get tired of it never changed faces in 5 days of wearing it all day
title: Nothing shy of great

author: Jack O'Brien
comment: I really want to use this watch face because it looks great, but the ambient mode has issues. It flickers on my Huawei watch and is too bright. The moon should be darker and the area around it should be black. Another small issue is that that planet in the background goes in the wrong position in ambient mode. If these issues we're corrected I'd rate it 5 stars.

author: Nigel Brown
comment: But also very functional; something many of the good-looking watch face designs seem to miss. There is no point in a beautiful watch face if telling the time isn't intuitive. It's not something you should need to think about. Don't over think design or make an attempt at half-baked humour. Form and function, folks. This one has both. Excellent job, dev.
title: Very pretty

author: Tom A
comment: Can't read the minutes number when screen backlight is off (suggest changing contrast for ambient mode). Otherwise, a great watch face!
title: Hard to read in ambient mode.

author: Michael Carey
comment: Have had this as my watch face for some time now. I usually change weekly but have been stuck on this one. Simple and artistic. Digging it!
title: Moto 360

author: Mohammed Rampurawala
comment: 4 stars because the only thing missing with watch face is battery percentage. It will be great to have it. The only thing I missed most.

author: Stevie Kideckel
comment: Great idea and design, one star off because 24 hour time settings are not respected and because the ambient mode minute planet does not match location of active mode
title: Beautiful design

author: Siddharth Dalai
comment: Drains the battery very quick. My watch was at full charge and I used one whole day, which included mostly Call and  SMS. And by the end of the day it was showing warning of low power. This is sad price to pay for using such an attractive and geeky interface.
title: Needs to improvement

author: William Cobb
comment: This is one of my favorite watch faces and one of the few I have keep around on my Huawei Watch. It's extremely high quality and I love the cute little animation of the spaceship as the seconds hand.  The only downside is that it seems to zap battery faster than some other faces due to the ambient mode being so extravagant. Still not enough of a problem for me to rate it anything but a five!

author: Carl Overstreet
comment: Carl telling Fool read learn some good tool every day time wasted money breaking a lot of people God still blessing his People Enjoy google thanks love it computer Bring
title: I enjoy being on this app help me no store selling the clothes off good network enjoy Google Internet sites

comment: Excellent - but could you remove the dark yellow border around the watch face? Most watches with square displays have rounded corners which hide part of the border, and this doesn't look nice.

author: Family Account
comment: Stuck with 12 hour click and backwards date. Nice idea though.
title: Not configurable

author: Vincent Scheib
comment: Beautiful and functional; Ambient mode lacking  Ambient would be better in color, and I would prefer it to not dim. As others note, the planet would be nice if it was updated in ambient mode also.  Thanks for the great watch face.

author: Russell Sloan
comment: Narrow text is hard to see on gray moon.  Would be nice if all time characters were the same font (or all bold).
title: It's OK

author: Yashvin Vedanaparti
comment: Like others have said, looks really cool and fun. Would be nice if there were options such as: the planet in ambient mode moves each minute. Get to pick planet type and more info to display, etc. Id be more than willing to pay for extra features. Also, improve the battery life👍
title: More options

author: Seth Rubio
comment: Only complaint is that the ambient mode is draining my battery. Please add an ambient mode that will just display the time. Other than that it's gorgeous and very well designed. Thank you!
title: Beautiful

author: Chris Zewatski
comment: Looks great on the watch. For those of you facing issues not showing up, install the watch face on your watch too. Wasn't showing up for me, had to install it also on my watch from playstore.

author: Farhad Bodhanwala
comment: Nice looking watch face. Ambient mode is not so nice. Hard to read

author: Noam Rathaus
comment: The app lacks the ability to control am or 24hr, step counter showing, battery level, etc. The graphics are amazing and nice to watch, recommended
title: Requires a bit more customization options

author: Dave S
comment: This face is simple, but it is wonderfully detailed. Love the smaller planet orbiting being used as the minutes and the orbiting rocket as the seconds. I have been using this for over 6 months and on my moto 360, I don't notice a huge battery drain. I think this free face rivals - and even beats - done of the paid faces.
title: Awesome!

author: Matthew Maylin
comment: As a space enthusiast, this simpe well designed watch face is one of my favourites. I espcially like the random shooting star effect in the background.

author: Daljit Ghoshal
comment: This is fantastic watch face. I love it, and my little boy loves it too. Really good work. Well done.  Please can you do the following:  Ambient mode:  1. Ambient mode must match actual time (planet needs to be in the correct position), and position needs to be updated every minute!  2.  Option to have full-colour ambient mode, this is a beautiful watch face and needs to be enjoyed in full colour!  3.  Option to choose time before it goes into ambient mode (up to 60 seconds).  4.  Option to select ambient mode full colour brightness level.  Hours/minutes:  1. Hours: How about a star that moves round the clock edge to show the hours?  2. Minutes: how about adding rings to the planet so that the rings act more like a pointer to the minutes?  3. Option to chose minute indicator will be great too.  Animations:  1. Add more: asteroids, comets, satellites, UFOs, etc, moving in different directions.  2. Option to choose which animations to show.  Charge for this, or make the above premium features! I and I am sure many others will pay for it!!  Please reply to let me know that you have received this.  Many thanks, D Ghoshal

author: Homars TV
comment: Been using this watch face for quite sometimes, only issue I have with it is that the planets position during the AMOLED mode does stays in one spot.

author: Alin Pavel
comment: if i leave ambient mode on will my screen have burned image on it after some time?
title: ambient mode-burnt screen?

author: Jaissal S
comment: I really like this one and use it when I'm a not at work hehe. As I'm using the Sony Smartwatch 3, it has a square screen. However, with the latest update the corners are now curved. Could you please incorporate this. Thanks.
title: Awesome watch face

author: Sergey Otro
comment: Beautiful watchface, it looks really nice on Moto 360.   I have to disable ambient mode, though. It drains battery and glows in the dark a lot. Plain black background with glowing starts and time would work much better for an ambient mode.

author: Shubhankar Valegaonkar
comment: We all love to travel, I connected with this watch face while I was traveling. It is minimal on design and high on visual appeal. It makes me feel like a space adventurer. Haha. Kudos guys!
title: The Traveller

author: Rishabh Jain
comment: Even after installing the app I Cannot see the watch face on wear app.

author: Kyle Hess
comment: It's a nice whimsical design and I use it often! It's very fun and I think it was well designed!  Highly recommend!
title: Very cool

author: phil winstanley
comment: Love this face...5yr old doing planets at school and keeps trying to pinch my watch to show his teacher

author: Cristina Patino
comment: I cannot find d it anywhere on my phone so that I can apply it to my watch 😕

author: Chris Welch
comment: This does everything one could wish for and with style. Crisp graphics and a tidy finish. My only request would be for battery levels. Sony Smartwatch 3.
title: Superb

author: Jordan Machado
comment: Very simple, easy to read and never had any problems! My watch lasts me all day sometimes into the next day.

author: Kevin Reuben
comment: I Love the design of this beautiful watch face.  and normally I don't give any reviews on apps.  <3
